sentences.en: A Quaker preacher, traveling in the more complaisant colony of Maryland, came upon a party of young people who were dancing merrily together.
sentences.cn: 一个贵格会的传道人，在更殷勤有礼的马里兰殖民地旅行时，遇到了一群年轻人在欢快的跳舞。

sentences.en: It is necessary that we should be more than complaisant to the count.
sentences.cn: 我们对伯爵在礼貌上就应该更殷勤一些.

sentences.en: Lin jiaxin belongs to temperament melting model belle bingle lets her look resemble a false boy complaisant straight hair can foil more those who give her is melting and comely!
sentences.cn: 林嘉欣属于气质甜美型的美女，短发让她看上去像个假小子，柔顺的直发更能衬托出她的甜美清秀！
她总是又殷勤,又乐于助人.

sentences.en: The courtier obeyed the king's orders in a complaisant manner.
sentences.cn: 在朝臣服从国王的命令，在殷勤的方式进行。

words.tran_cn: 彬彬有礼的；顺从的；殷勤的

trans.tran_cn: <正>恭敬的，恳切的，殷勤的，默认的
trans.tran_en: showing a desire to comply or oblige; polite
